subject: Re: WSP - AI Article
body:
Hi Nick. No worries at all.
My WSP email is active again too.
I am ok to remove the sentence.
Kind regards
On Wed, 2 Apr 2025, 8:32â€¯am Mirsepassi, Nick, <
Nick.Mirsepassi@wsp.com
> wrote:
Hi Gencer,
Hope you are well, sorry to reach out on your personal email.
I had a chat with Dara to finalise the article and she made some changes to question 1 removing the following sentence.
I just wanted to reach out and make sure you are comfortable with it before we proceed?
Please see below:
Thanks
Nick
Nick Mirsepassi
Tunnel Engineer/Data Scientist
